author.name: Alex Brenon
author.biography: Research Assistant for ESD and Classics at UMass Amherst. Creator of Pop-Up Astronomy.

author.name: Andrew Nevins
author.biography: I'm a front-end developer helping people remove barriers from the Web.

author.name: Cameron Cundiff
author.biography: Cameron is a software development leader, immersive tech pioneer, and accessibility specialist.

author.name: Dave Rupert
author.biography: I'm Dave Rupert, lead developer at Paravel. I co-host ShopTalk, an award-winning sound effects podcast that also covers web development. I'm a dad to two wonderful kids. I live in Austin, TX; the best damn city, in the best damn state, in the best damn country, in the whole damn world.

author.name: Duncan Jimbo
author.biography: Howdy! I'm Duncan, a front-end developer focused on design systems.

author.name: Emily Lane
author.biography: Hi! I’m a recent grad with design and UX experience and a killer sense of humor. I’m currently working on munch., helping to find healthy food for pets.

author.name: Emma Patricios
author.biography: I develop dynamic and responsive websites that are easy to use and look fantastic on any device.

author.name: Eric Bailey
author.biography: I help create straightforward solutions that address a person’s practical, physical, cognitive, and emotional needs using accessible, performant, device-agnostic technology.

author.name: Erik Runyon
author.biography: I am the Technical Director and a web developer for Marketing Communications at the University of Notre Dame.

author.name: Franklyn Roth
author.biography: Front-End developer focused on delivering rich web applications in the vue.js and node.js ecosystems.

author.name: Dennis Gaebel
author.biography: I'm Dennis. I specialize in SVG Animations, UI Prototyping, Visual Design, and building Modular Atomic Design Systems for the Web. I also consult and write about it.

author.name: Guilherme Simões
author.biography: I'm a Software Engineer, currently working at Sky. I have a passion for technology, data visualization and open-source.

author.name: Hamsa Harcourt
author.biography: Hi, Hamsa Harcourt here, currently juggling the reins of Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Technical Writing & Software Development.

author.name: Luis Garcia
author.biography: Father, accessibility evangelist, video gamer, proof checker, and solver of problems.

author.name: Marcy Sutton
author.biography: Independent web developer and accessibility specialist. Camera-toting hiker, biker, pie baker.

author.name: Mat Marquis
author.biography: My name is Mat “Wilto” Marquis, and I make websites. I’m an independent consultant. My specialization is inclusive web development.

author.name: Matthew Higgins
author.biography: Software generalist. Avid coffee drinker. Sometimes runner.

author.name: Michael Fairchild
author.biography: Web Developer and forever a student.

author.name: Monika Piotrowicz
author.biography: Director of International UX at Shopify, leading a globally distributed team, localizing a product.

author.name: Nat Tarnoff
author.biography: Founder of MadHackerHaus and Rolled Up Sleeves, LLC. Advocate for accessibility in developing the internet and mobile technology.

author.name: Rachel R. Vasquez
author.biography: Senior WordPress Developer.

author.name: Scott O'Hara
author.biography: Scott O'Hara is a designer and developer based outside of Boston MA. He writes code and cares a ton about building great, accessible user experiences for everyone.

author.name: Susan Robertson
author.biography: Hi. I'm Susan Robertson, a design implementer. I spend my days thinking about HTML, CSS, accessibility and design systems.

author.name: Scott Vinkle
author.biography: Hi, I'm Scott. Web accessibility consultant and front end engineer from Toronto, Canada.
